titles: A defence and continuation of the Discourse concerning the period of humane life being a reply to a late answer, entituled A letter to a gentleman, &c. : to which is added, an appendix wherein several objections urged in private are considered, and Mr. Gales severe, but groundless charge is examined.
author: Allestree, Richard, 1619-1681.
publisher: Printed, and are to be sold by Enoch Wyer,
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
keywords: Allestree, Richard, 1619-1681. --  Discourse concerning the period of humane life.
Gale, Theophilus, 1628-1678. --  Court of the Gentiles.
Letter to a gentleman, in answer to a late book, entituled, A discourse concerning the period of humane life.
